name: BeigeNoise
0:
”Alexa open Beige Noise”
”Alexa ask Beige Noise to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: beige noise
des:
Discover the unique and calming properties of beige noise. A balanced mix of high and low frequencies, beige noise is ideal for improving focus, masking background noise, and aiding sleep.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Beige Noise
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
